about_the_game:
"Leila's Farming Game Soundtrack" is a music pack with 22 tracks, of which 20 are loopable.
I drew inspiration from classic farming RPG games to make a variety of tracks to set different moods.
Most of them are focused on building a cozy atmosphere, farming vegetables, grow some animals and maybe go on an adventure!
For your convenience, the songs are also available in different file extensions.

The track list consists of:
- Title Screen (No Loop)
- Village Festival
- Forest
- Caves
- Village
- Rainy Day
- Spring
- Autumn
- Summer
- Winter
- Beach
- Tavern
- General Store
- Church
- Toolshop
- Romance
- Marriage
- Comedy
- Peaceful Bliss
- End Game (No Loop)
- Battle Song 01
- Battle Song 02

_______________________

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
